name: YARANDIN LLC
description:
YARANDIN is an East European (Ukrainian) IT company offering its services since 2010. At the moment we offer professional services for creation, implementation, and development of Web systems for clients around the globe.
  Our highly qualified team of professional developers is the core of the company. At Yarandin, we successfully developed and launched more than 5 large projects and over 50 smaller ones, all using modern technology and methodology, with an approach developed and successfully realized by our company.
  Our mission is to constantly strive to create a highly qualified professional development team, with the perfect flexible approach to any situation, to guarantee you the highest-quality solutions, and complete the most difficult and reckless tasks you, the client, may pose, to your satisfaction.
  At Yarandin, we are oriented at fulfilling the client’s demands, without limiting our audience. We offer our services for both corporate clients and small businessmen, and we have the optimal solution for everyone.
